verses.verse: Moreover Ahithophel <S%H302><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto Absalom <S%H53><s%>, Let me now choose out <S%H977><s%> twelve <S%H8147><s%> thousand <S%H505><s%> men <S%H376><s%>, and I will arise <S%H6965><s%> and pursue <S%H7291><s%> after <S%H310><s%> David <S%H1732><s%> this night <S%H3915><s%>:

Behold <S%H2244><s%>, he is hid now in some <S%H259><s%> pit <S%H6354><s%>, or in some <S%H259><s%> other place <S%H4725><s%>: and it will come to pass <S%H5307><s%>, when some of them are fallen at the first <S%H8462><s%>, that whosoever <S%H8085><s%> heareth <S%H8085><s%> it will say <S%H559><s%>, There is a slaughter <S%H4046><s%> among the people <S%H5971><s%> that follow <S%H310><s%> Absalom <S%H53><s%>.

But I counsel <S%H3289><s%> that all Israel <S%H3478><s%> be gathered <S%H622><s%> together <S%H622><s%> unto thee <S%H1835><s%>, from Dan even to Beer-sheba <S%H884><s%>, as the sand <S%H2344><s%> that is by the sea <S%H3220><s%> for multitude <S%H7230><s%>; and that thou go <S%H1980><s%> to battle <S%H7128><s%> in thine own person <S%H6440><s%>.

Now Jonathan <S%H3083><s%> and Ahimaaz <S%H290><s%> were staying <S%H5975><s%> by En-rogel <S%H5883><s%>; and a maid-servant <S%H8198><s%> used to go <S%H1980><s%> and tell <S%H5046><s%> them <S%H1980><s%>; and they went and told <S%H5046><s%> king <S%H4428><s%> David <S%H1732><s%>: for they might <S%H3201><s%> not be seen <S%H7200><s%> to come <S%H935><s%> into the city <S%H5892><s%>.

But a lad <S%H5288><s%> saw <S%H7200><s%> them <S%H5046><s%>, and told Absalom <S%H53><s%>: and they went <S%H3212><s%> both <S%H8147><s%> of them away quickly <S%H4120><s%>, and came <S%H935><s%> to the house <S%H1004><s%> of a man <S%H376><s%> in Bahurim <S%H980><s%>, who had a well <S%H875><s%> in his court <S%H2691><s%>; and they went down <S%H3381><s%> thither <S%H8033><s%>.

And the woman <S%H802><s%> took <S%H3947><s%> and spread <S%H6566><s%> the covering <S%H4539><s%> over the well <S%H875><s%>'s mouth <S%H6440><s%>, and strewed <S%H7849><s%> bruised grain <S%H7383><s%> thereon <S%H1697><s%>; and nothing was known <S%H3045><s%>.
